hadiths.text: Narrated Humaid:Anas was asked, "Did Allah's Messenger (ï·º) wear a ring?" He said, "Yes. Once he delayed the `Isha' prayer till midnight and after the prayer, he faced us and said, 'The people prayed and have slept and you remained in prayer as long as you waited for it.'
